page.title: 01SUMMARY OF AREA
page.content: The block centres on Edmonton which is a part of the Greater London conurbation.The PARISH CHURCH of All Saints in Church Street is the earliest building in Edmonton. The Lea Navigation _ is part of the River Lea which passes through Edmonton. Communications- Two major roads going North /South plus the North Circular going East_West. Two B.R. Lines North/South. Large flourishing industrial estates_ The major shopping area is the recently remodelled Edmonton Green.Mixture of Council and privately owned residences.There are pockets of closely knit stable indigenous communities particularly in the East.There is a rich mixture of ethnic groups represented. It is a densely populated area.
